Title: Batman
Description: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first battle against the clown prince of crime, the Joker.

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague Gotham City, but a new threat emerges in the form of the Joker.

Title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
Description: Fearing the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of hero it really needs.

Title: The Dark Knight Rises
Description: Eight years after the Joker's reign of terror, Batman must face a new threat in the form of the ruthless mercenary Bane, who seeks to destroy Gotham City.

Title: Batman Begins
Description: After witnessing his parents' murder, Bruce Wayne travels the world to train and prepare himself to fight against evil, eventually becoming the Dark Knight.

Title: The LEGO Batman Movie
Description: A spin-off of the LEGO Movie, this film follows the adventures of Batman as he tries to stop the Joker from taking over Gotham City.

Title: Batman Forever
Description: Batman must stop Two-Face and the Riddler from robbing Gotham City's banks and destroying the city.

Title: Batman & Robin
Description: Batman and Robin try to stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

Title: Batman Returns
Description: Batman must stop the Penguin and Catwoman from taking over Gotham City.

Title: Star Wars
Description: Luke Skywalker joins the Rebel Alliance to destroy the Death Star and save the galaxy from the evil Empire.

Title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
Description: Rey develops her powers as a Jedi, while Finn and a new ally, Rose, embark on a mission to stop the First Order.

Title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
Description: A new hero, Rey, emerges to battle the First Order, a new evil force that has risen from the ashes of the Empire.

Title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
Description: Two Jedi Knights, Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi, must protect Queen Amidala and destroy the evil Trade Federation.

Title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
Description: Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi lead the Clone Wars against the evil Separatist Alliance.

Title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
Description: Luke Skywalker trains as a Jedi under Yoda, while Han Solo and Leia Organa evade the Empire's forces.

Title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
Description: Anakin Skywalker is seduced by the dark side and becomes Darth Vader, leading to the fall of the Jedi Order.

Title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
Description: The Rebel Alliance, led by Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, and Leia Organa, launches a final attack on the Empire's new Death Star.

Title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
Description: Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker lead the Clone Wars, while Senator Padm√© Amidala is targeted for assassination

Title: Star Wars: Threads of Destiny
Description: A group of heroes must band together to stop the evil Empire and save the galaxy

Title: Star Wars: Lost Horizons
Description: A group of rebels must navigate the dangers of the galaxy to uncover a hidden secret

Title: Star Wars: Star Warriors
Description: A group of heroes must band together to stop the evil Empire and save the galaxy
